reviewText:
Very cheap and nasty dvd, just a avi, mpeg like clip. No menu, just a man with a cam wasting time making people spend their hard earned money on crap.

If you read a good gun cleaning book the man in this dvd misses lots and I could do better with a 1800 century cam. Save your money and if you I could I would like a refund
need a newer version of just cleaning semi-automatics
